entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory uses backslashes (\) for directory seperation, even on Linux #98247
  • Announcement: BinaryFormatter is being removed in .NET 9 #98245
    9.0.0
  • Bug in XsdDataContractImporter when importing ComplexType #98240
  • D decompression handler is case-sensitive #98236
  • Configuration binding ignores ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration and throws #98231
    Future
  • JIT: missing opportunity for Redundant Branch Opt #98227
    Future
  • Question/request for documentation on .NET WASM runtime env vars #98225
  • HTTP/3 stress test has occasional QuicException #98220
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskAwaitPendingResult #98219
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: Invalid typed array length #98217
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ThreadingTimer #98216
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Chrome test failure `DebuggerTests.SteppingTests.SteppingIntoLibrarySymbolsLoadedFromSymbolServerRemoveSymbolServerAndStepAgain` #98215
  • [browser][MT] enable worker threads in sgen GC #98214
    9.0.0
  • [infra] Mono runs only a Xunit subset of runtime tests #98213
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Makefile for runtime build is broken #98210
  • .NET 9 per-preview performance overview #98209
    9.0.0
  • Test duration reported by `dotnet test` is inaccurate for xUnit async tests #98205
  • double.Cos and double.SinCos can produce very different results #98204
  • [browser][MT] HttpClientCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98201
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for lazy evalution of message and args parameters in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggerExtensions to improve performance #98200
    Future

Closed

  • Test failure: HandleRefTest.Validate_NoGC() #97334
  • HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT has invalid value on custom .NET runtime host on Linux #97086
    8.0.x
  • `Math.Round[F](x, MidpointRounding)` doesn't use `VROUNDS[SD]` outside of "to even" #98164
  • [API Proposal]: An official way to determine whether the given value is JIT-time constant or not #98153
  • [API Proposal]:Replace method CountBy #98169
  • [mono] Remove framework-specific code and unnecessary MonoDomain usage #45034
    Future
  • Memory stolen from sql server when using CLR SQLDataReader #98181
  • Ambiguous constructors exception #98228
  • Blazor Wasm dotnet 8 preview 6 doesn't work on chrome android phone #89028
    8.0.0
  • ARM64: redundant overflow and divbyzero checks #98100
    9.0.0
  • AOT compilation to publish program the code from the dependency libraries cannot be included in the DLL #96036
  • Random "dummy" file in repository #98161
  • [browser] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests - abort early #97518
    9.0.0
  • [browser] GC - Assertion: should not be reached - simple_nursery_serial_scan_object #97543
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] various WebWorkerTest CI failures #96628
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Let me define serialisation strings for enum values with AOT #98188
  • Consider splitting up `System.Text.Json` tests to allow running them completely with wasm/AOT #87078
    Future
  • Compiling Wasm AOT breaks when using protobuf-net 2.x as a dependency #70444
    9.0.0
  • InvalidCastException thrown after TimerQueueTimer.CallCallback #81211
    7.0.x
  • Avoid bundling unnecessary functionality in the wasm published output #48225
    Future
  • [wasm] Experiment with getting rid of SHA1Transform in the runtime #43693
    Future
  • [mono][gc] Objects larger than LOS section size call the LOS heap to grow without bound #97991

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98249
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FR_2A, GB_2A, FV_2A, FY_3A #98248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/6.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98246
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • [release/7.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98244
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • JIT: Add FlowEdge destination block member #98243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98241
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98239
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: a bunch of peepholes for AND and OR operations #98237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Using dotnet 9's save assembly api for debugging DI IL emit #98234
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Pass the minimum macOS version to the linker #98233
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Simplify method_needs_stack_walk (). #98230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix gc-related bugs in risc-v emitter #98226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "[browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null " #98221
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Workaround an MSVC bug with __libm_sse2_sincos_ #98207
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance

Merged

  • Disable `Validate_NoGC()` test under GCStress #98242
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.3
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in m… #97850
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.3
  • Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98198
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable failing assertions triggered by the FastReducer implementation. #98212
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Simplify and optimize Math(F).Round #98186
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set naive likelihoods when initializing preds #98192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97352
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle open types to appear in interface maps #98182
    Servicing-approved, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97650
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Use VectorXx.Indices in several places #98203
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][jit] Add minimal support for unsupported avx instruction sets. #98151
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Delete random "dummy" file #98179
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ARM64: Optimize overflow and divbyzero checks with assertions #98113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `RhCorElementTypeInfo` #98144
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use faster unchecked write-barrier for boxed statics #98166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix a windows build issue. #98206
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97883
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.17
  • [mono][jit] More SIMD cleanups #97958
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97568
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • Fix intermediate runtime dependency #98202
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][sgen] Prevent concurrent sweep from blocking major collections #98154
    area-GC-mono
  • Propagate installers in runtime output in VMR build #98104
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GP_3A` to `SVE_HV_4A` #98141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sin/Cos #98194
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Remove C-String PAL wrappers #98189
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FK_3{A,B,C}, EJ_3A, EK_3A, EY_3B, EW_3{A,B} #98187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • This is an incomplete implementation of a new randomized allocation s… #98167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple LoadVector API's #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Update ceeload.cpp #98197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [CI][browser] Limit parallelism for browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_AOT to fix hanging CI #97992
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
